example_utterances: Absolutely. I'm willing to do whatever it takes to regain your trust.
Yes, I remember that. So, what do you have in mind?
I couldn't agree more. We also need to make time for each other, instead of focusing so much on work.
You're right. I'll make sure to do that more often. I just want you to know how much I appreciate you taking me back.
Yes, let's do that. I know it won't be easy, but I'm willing to put in the effort.
Hey, honey, have you ever been hunting before?
Well, I was thinking that it could be a fun activity for us to do together. I know you're busy with work and everything, but it would be nice to spend some quality time together out in nature.
Perfect! I'll make all the arrangements and we can plan a weekend trip. I promise I'll show you the ropes and we'll have a fantastic time.
Agreed. It reminds me of when I asked you to take me back after our rough patch. I knew we needed to do something out of the ordinary to reconnect and rekindle our love.
I feel so lucky to have you by my side and to be able to share these experiences with you.
